abstractContent.text: This paper describes our system created for the Financial Document Structure Extraction Shared Task (FinTOC-2019) Task A: Title Detection.

entities.text: Financial Document Structure Extraction Shared Task (FinTOC-2019) Task A

abstractContent.text: We rely on the XML representation of the financial prospectuses for additional layout information about the text (font type, font size, etc.).
Our constrained system uses only the provided training data without any additional external resources.
Our system is based on the Maximum Entropy classifier and various features including font type and font size.
Our system achieves F1 score 97.2% and is ranked #3 among 10 submitted systems.

introductionContent.text: Financial documents are used to report activities, financial situation, investment plans, and operational information to shareholders, investors, and financial markets.
These reports are usually created on an annual basis in machine-readable formats often only with minimal structure information.
The goal of the Financial Document Structure Extraction Shared Task (FinTOC-2019)) is to analyse these financial prospectuses and automatically extract their structure similarly to.
